features.name: Bubbles UI
features.documentation:
The bubble appears.

It has a tail.

It is yellow.
features.constraints:
PRECONDITION Welcome IS done 

bubble appears: 
WHEN Hint IS Hello World 
THEN Bubble IS #present 
 AND Bubble content IS Hello World

bubble is moved:
WHEN Java code IS something 
WHEN Hint IS Hello World AND Hint line number IS 6

features.name: Java running
features.documentation:
R1 The program is able to run Java code.

R2 It outputs its output to the Output pane

R3 It can receive input from the input pane
features.constraints:
PRECONDITION Welcome IS done 

hello world (R1; R2):
    WHEN Java code IS hello world 
    WHEN Run IS #pressed
    THEN Output IS hello world

features.name: Welcome
features.constraints:
done:
WHEN URL IS ${SUT}
THEN Message IS welcome message 
WHEN Start button IS #pressed
THEN Java code IS #present
